snippet.title: King's Blade - Demo Available
snippet.description:
Play the Demo King's Blade: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2204620/Kings_Blade/

King's Blade - classic Beat'em up, inspired by the Conan the Barbarian universe and games like Golden Axe and Streets of Rage. Take on the role of a warrior of an elite royal squad and defeat the bloodthirsty Barganian Empire.

Key features:
- 6 playable characters.
- 12 unique levels.
- Intense combat system with various combos, additional weapons and spells.
- Local co-op for up to 4 players.
- Co-op with AI.

Release date: 2024

Games on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Alexey+Suslin
Games on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/AlexeySuslin
Website: https://alexeysuslin.com
